channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8608] Do an edit of logs.. we log too much.
item.description: Since we enabled blooms, there is a bunch of bloom spew.... We also do a bunch of logging around new file open....
item.summary: Do an edit of logs.. we log too much.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Minor edit moving stuff to trace level.

if (LOG.isTraceEnabled()) LOG.trace(s);

This check is probably not useful, string is already built

Integrated in hbase-0.95 #212 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/hbase-0.95/212/)
HBASE-8608 Do an edit of logs.. we log too much. (Revision 1485903)

Result = FAILURE
